tuv.seg: Case study 1: Family Income Supplement (FIS)
Cás-Staidéar 1: Forlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh (FIT)
This is an example showing how income is assessed for Family Income Supplement in 2017
Seo sampla a thaispeánann conas a ríomhtar ioncam i leith Forlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh in 2017
Mary has three children
Tá triúr leanaí ag Mary
Her youngest child is five years old
Tá an leanbh is óige atá aici cúig bliana d’aois
She is getting a One-Parent Family Payment (OFP) and was recently offered work part-time
Tá íocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora á fáil aici agus tairgeadh obair pháirtaimseartha di le déanaí
If she takes the job, she will work three days each week and earn €300
Má ghlacann sí leis an bpost, beidh sí ag obair trí lá sa tseachtain agus tuillfidh sí €300
Mary wants to take the job as all of her children are now in school but she knows her One-Parent Family Payment will be affected
Ba mhaith le Mary glacadh leis an bpost toisc go bhfuil a leanaí ar fad ar scoil anois ach tuigeann sí go gcuirfear isteach ar a hÍocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora
Would Mary be better off financially if she takes the job offer?
An mbeadh Mary níos fearr as ó thaobh airgid de dá nglacfadh sí leis an tairiscint oibre?
She has lived in her home for 20 years and has a small mortgage
Tá sí ina cónaí ina teach le 20 bliain anuas agus tá morgáiste measartha beag aici
She gets a weekly maintenance payment of €80 for her mortgage costs which does not affect her One-Parent Family Payment
Faigheann sí íocaíocht chothabhála €80 in aghaidh na seachtaine i leith a costais mhorgáiste, rud nach gcuireann isteach ar a hÍocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora
Her 18-year-old daughter is a student has a part-time job in a local shop
Tá post páirtaimseartha ag a hiníon is sine i siopa áitiúil
Weekly net income from employment (See note 1) €300.00
Glanioncam seachtainiúil ó fhostaíocht (féach nóta 1) €300.00
Add Weekly net income from self-employment €0.00
Móide Glanioncam seachtainiúil ó fhéinfhostaíocht €0.00
Add reduced OFP (See note 2) €194.90
Móide Íocaíochtaí Leasa Shóisialaigh (Féach nóta 2) €194.90
Add Income from occupational pensions €0.00
Móide Ioncam ó Phinsin ghairme €0.00
Add Maintenance received €80.00
Móide Airgead Cothabhála a fhaightear €80.00
The Family Income Supplement (FIS) maximum income limit for a family with three children is €713
Is é an uasteorainn ioncaim don Fhorlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh (FIT) i gcás teaghlaigh ina bhfuil triúr leanaí ná €713
The difference between €713 and €574.90 is €138.10
Is é an difríocht idir €713 agus €574.90 ná €138.10
60% of the difference (€138.10) is €82.86
60% den difríocht €138.10 is €82.86
Mary will get a FIS payment of €83 (rounded up) each week
Gheobhaidh Mary íocaíocht FIT €83 gach seachtain (slánaithe suas)
If she takes the job her total gross income including FIS will be €657.90 (€194.90 OFP plus €83 FIS plus €300 income from work plus €80 from maintenance)
Má ghlacann sí leis an bpost beidh ioncam iomlán €657.90 aici lena n-áirítear FIT
Mary’s net income from employment is assessed for FIS, however her daughter’s income is not assessed because she is under 22 years of age and in full-time education
Déantar glanioncam Mary ó fhostaíocht a mheasúnú i leith FIT, ach, ní mheasúnaítear ioncam a hiníne toisc go bhfuil sí faoi bhun 22 bliain d’aois agus in oideachas lánaimseartha
If Mary gets €300 from employment, her One-Parent Family Payment will be reduced. (€110 of income from employment is disregarded and 50% of the remaining €190 - which is €95 - is assessed as means)
Má fhaigheann Mary €300 ó fhostaíocht, laghdófar a hÍocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora go dtí €105.50
She gets €29.80 for each child so her total payment will be €194.90
Gheobhaidh sí €29.80 freisin do gach leanbh
More information is available about how income from employment affects your One-Parent Family Payment
Léigh anseo chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoin gcaoi a dtéann ioncam ó fhostaíocht i bhfeidhm ar d’Íocaíocht do Theaghlach Aon-Tuismitheora
